LURGASHALL ENGLISH MEAD 75cl

ENGLISH MEAD 75 CL x 6 1/2 CASE Made from fermented honey, this is Englands oldest alcoholic beverage. Serve mulled with spices in winter, or over ice in summer. Style Medium sweet Alc 12.5% Size 75cl 
 We love mead... and its honey properties

We buy it online from http://www.dinkydrinks.co.uk

Hopback Brewery Entire Stout polypin 20 litre

Entire Stout - 4.5% A.B.V A rich dark stout with a strong roasted malt flavour and a long, smooth malty aftertaste. Winner of the best Stout at the 1995 Great British Beer Festival, London Olympia. 20 litres Polypin 

we love this beer and buy it online from http://www.dinkydrinks.co.uk

Hopback Brewery Sumer Lightening polypin 20 litre

Summer lightning - 5.0% A.B.V Straw coloured, very fresh hoppy aroma and excellent long dry finish. East Kent Goldings and Challenger hops 20 litres Polypin 


We love this ale and buy it online in an amazing 20 litre polypin from http://www.dinkydrinks.co.uk
